name: Syrup Village Forest

debut.context: First shown as the location where Kaya flees from Jango

keyEvents.description: Kaya and the Usopp Pirates flee through the forest while being pursued by Jango.
The Usopp Pirates attempt to ambush Jango in the forest using traps and weapons.
Kaya agrees to sign her will in the forest to save the Usopp Pirates from Jango's threats.
Zoro and Usopp arrive in the forest to rescue Kaya from Jango.

description: A forested area near Syrup Village where Kaya and the Usopp Pirates flee from Jango during the Black Cat Pirates' attack on the village.

name: Northern Coast of Syrup Village
nameJapanese: シロップ村の北の海岸

keyEvents.description: Pandaman appears as a member of the Black Cat Pirates during the battle at the northern coast.
Kuro reveals his plan to kill his entire crew at the northern coast.
Kuro unleashes his Shakushi technique for the first time at the northern coast, attacking everything indiscriminately.
Black Cat Pirates are wounded by their own captain's Shakushi technique at the northern coast.
Luffy struggles to fight against Kuro's speed at the northern coast.

description: The northern coastline of Syrup Village where the main battle between Luffy and the Black Cat Pirates takes place.
